response.summary:
- Industrial Engineer with 10+ years of experience in projects in the public and private sector for business improvement through mathematical, data, simulation and business modeling. 
- Team leader in LatAm region, providing software solutions in advanced analytics and artificial intelligence. 
- Professor and researcher in  network theory, supply chain and operations research.

profile_positions.title: Head of Analytics & AI - Mexico & USA | Minsait

profile_positions.description:
In charge of the development and growth of the Latin-American advanced analytics and data science (AI, ML, MLOps).

- Set up philosophy, framework, and management, into an AS IS - TO BE vision for the next 3 years.
- Recruit, train, develop, coach and supervise employees, increasing a strong team.
- Engaging with global leadership, consultant and technology teams to understand the challenges and requirements for the LatAm region.
- On-boarding clients and stakeholders, building strong and trusted relationships.
profile_positions.title: Head of Analytics & AI - LatAm | Minsait

profile_positions.description:
Description: Expert Lead overseeing and leading cross-functional projects. Using advanced analytics and analysis modeling techniques to discover insights to guide strategic decisions and uncover optimization opportunities.

Responsibilities:
- Manage different projects along with the organization.
-  On-boarding clients and stakeholders, building strong and trusted relationships
- Define and prioritize business requirements specifications with clients and stakeholders (StRS)
- Develop high-level project estimations for clients.
- Recruit, train, develop and supervise employees, developing a strong team.
- Communicate results and business impacts of insight initiatives to the project’s stakeholders.
- Design and implement mathematical, statistical, machine learning and simulation models according to the client’s requirements.
- Lead data migration and best practices implementation about data governance

profile_positions.description:
Project: Diagnosis of the state of technology and technology assessment and operation processes in the logistics and distribution system in Cundinamarca.

- Delegate tasks and set deadlines.

- Specify DSS data requirements and its business processes.
- Design databases for DSS correct execution and the models implemented in it.
- Data processing for enterprise characterization and diagnosis.
- Design mathematical and good practice models for the improvement of systems.

profile_positions.title: Assistant Director - Operations Management

company.name: Indra
company.description: Indra is one of the leading global technology and consulting companies and the technological partner for core business operations of its customers worldwide. It is a world-leader in providing proprietary solutions in specific segments in Transport and Defence markets, and a leading firm in Digital Transformation and Information Technologies in Spain and Latin America through its affiliate Minsait. Its business model is based on a comprehensive range of proprietary products, with a high-value, end-to-end focus and with a high innovation component. In the 2022 financial year, Indra achieved revenue totaling €3,851 billion, almost 57,000 employees, a local presence in 46 countries and business operations in over 140 countries.
